body.content:
Book between now and 20th March 2022 for stays till 20th March 2022
Add ihcltata.com to the "safe list" | View on Web
Join us to celebrate the hues of Holi, and experience our living palaces, scenic resorts, city hotels and charming retreats come alive with festivities.
Special
Room Rates
Enjoy special savings on stays as you journey through India with us.
Complimentary
Daily Breakfast & One Meal
Indulge in special delights at Breakfast and Lunch or Dinner.
Festive
Amenity
Savour the flavours of the festival with a unique platter of delicacies.
Festive Décor and Celebrations
Revel and rejoice as the splash of colors fills your stay with cheer.
Book between now and 20th March 2022 for stays till 20th March 2022.
BOOK NOW
*Terms & conditions apply. Subject to availability.
RESERVATIONS (24x7)
India: 1 800 111 825  ▪  Email: reservations@ihcltata.com
Web: www.tajhotels.com

value.subject: Pre-Market Dossier & Research tracker 09 March 2022
value.bodyPreview:
India Market Outlook
Indian markets are likely to open on a cautious note, tracking weak signals from the Asian markets amid continued uncertainty over Russia's invasion of Ukraine and ahead of key events and data due this week. Nifty50 technical support

body.content:
India Market Outlook 
Indian markets are likely to open on a cautious note, tracking weak signals from the Asian markets amid continued uncertainty over Russia's invasion of Ukraine and ahead of key events and data due this week. Nifty50 technical supports are placed at 15800 and 15600 while resistances are at 16080 and 16230 levels.
Please find attached India Pre-Market Dossier & Research tracker for 09 March 2022.

Investment Strategy
Standard Chartered Securities (India) Limited
Email: scsi.investmentstrategy@sc.com
Address: 2nd Floor, 23-25 M. G. Road, Fort, Mumbai – 400 001, India.
Website: https://www.standardcharteredtrade.co.in/

body.content:
Help Protect What Matters Most
Now, more than ever, it’s important to help protect the ones you love. And we’re here to help. Our agents/producers are insurance professionals who will listen to your needs and recommend a solution to help secure your family’s financial future and preserve their way of life.


Take The First Step Today

*Sample rates provided are 10-year term, non-smoker, preferred underwriting.
Products not available in all states.

Term Life Answers
